name: Life//Death
description:
Created this game as my entry for Jabrils Game Jam 1.

The game consists of a story you can walk through and make decisions while also solving some small puzzles.

Won't give any spoilers and reveal too much so just download it and remember to turn down the volume via windows sound mixer since I didn't even think about creating an ingame option for that (and the bass is kinda deafening over a few minutes of gameplay and will most likely destroy your headphones   ( it most likely wont, but I wouldn't test it if I were you) - therefore play at own risk).

The whole game was created in 20 hours.
All sounds (except the Thunder sound) was created by me using free generators (and Audacity).

All 3D models and materials were also made entirely by me.



Used third party assets:

&

Unreal Engine First Person Character Assets [Base Engine Content]
